td.content: s:patient presents with 17 months history of moderate abdominal pain. she is a female system administrator aged 66 yrs. she smokes one pack daily for 4 years she drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 64 in, Weight 158 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily, and ordered CBC with Manual Differential.
